channel.title: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help

item.title: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:21, topic:482747”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=600981.msg4219059#msg4219059 date=1360616239]
Misc.random(100) would be 101 because java starts counting at 0
[/quote]
^

And I really like the idea. But instead of doing it like this. Why not make the actual flowers work, and have it call out for each id when the flower is on the ground.

You could also make it send the message (would take some work) to people in a X square radius of you. So you can’t scam them.[/quote]
idk why every stupid faggot leecher is having trouble with flower type minigames…

its actually so easy to make lmao id release one but i hate 90% of ppl

Read full topic
item.source: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help

item.title: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Clawz fury:

Misc.random(100) would be 101 because java starts counting at 0

^

And I really like the idea. But instead of doing it like this. Why not make the actual flowers work, and have it call out for each id when the flower is on the ground.

You could also make it send the message (would take some work) to people in a X square radius of you. So you can’t scam them.

Read full topic

item.title: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help
item.dc:creator: @DXRX DXRX
item.description:
@DXRX wrote:

[quote=“cdj, post:1, topic:482747”]I Wanna Take This Code… Flip It So Its like
I wanna kno how to… make it soo it Says…

  • RYB. PURPLE . YELLOW . ORANGE. ECT. BLACK FLOWER WHITE FLOWER… IDK U GUYS. might think its dumb but i thought it was kinda smart. cuz like… the other pi flowergames i tried. dont show my flower planted so i thought i made. it just like the dice game … i need help to make this game…

as in calling the names out of the flower u rolled insted of number.? lmao…
please someone

vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

[quote]//Dice bag
if (itemId == 15084 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) {
c.forcedChat(“I Planted a “+ Misc.random(100) +” Flower!”);
c.startAnimation(827);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/quote]

[quote]//Dice bag
if (itemId == 15084 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) {
c.forcedChat(“I have rolled a “+ Misc.random(100) +” on the percentile dice.”);
c.startAnimation(827);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/quote][/quote]

OMG SMART AF… How wud u do that tho LMAO

Misc.random(100)

< Flip that to say?? the flower. but random i see waht u did i even tried like

Misc.random(100) < White >Flower
but always same color … so idk

Read full topic

item.title: My Own Custom Flower Game? Help
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

I Wanna Take This Code… Flip It So Its like
I wanna kno how to… make it soo it Says…

  • RYB. PURPLE . YELLOW . ORANGE. ECT. BLACK FLOWER WHITE FLOWER… IDK U GUYS. might think its dumb but i thought it was kinda smart. cuz like… the other pi flowergames i tried. dont show my flower planted so i thought i made. it just like the dice game … i need help to make this game…

as in calling the names out of the flower u rolled insted of number.? lmao…
please someone

vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

//Dice bag if (itemId == 15084 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { c.forcedChat("I Planted a "+ Misc.random(100) +" Flower!"); c.startAnimation(827); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
//Dice bag if (itemId == 15084 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { c.forcedChat("I have rolled a "+ Misc.random(100) +" on the percentile dice."); c.startAnimation(827); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
